snippet: David Beckham was sent off in a game recently -- after he prostested a referee's call at a youth soccer game in Los Angeles!
abstract: David Beckham was sent off in a game recently -- after he prostested a referee's call at a youth soccer game in Los Angeles!
lead_paragraph: David Beckham has been there, done that, and not only does he have the T-shirt, he's got the red card.

headline.main: Beckham Sent Off - at a Youth Soccer Game
